statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' AND rating < 4 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM review WHERE product_id = 10 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY customer_id DESC, feedback_id;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM review WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM review WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM product_reviews WHERE review_id = 10;
SELECT customer_id, feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating < 2;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_level) AS avg_satisfaction FROM service_feedback;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, review_text FROM product_reviews ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT feedback, rating FROM product_reviews WHERE rating > 4
SELECT customer_id, feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT review_id, product_id, review_text FROM product_reviews WHERE rating < 3
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_level FROM service_feedback ORDER BY satisfaction_level
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT review_id, review_text, review_date FROM reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id FROM feedback WHERE product_id = 2 AND rating = 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT reviews.review_id, reviews.review_text, products.product_name FROM reviews JOIN products ON reviews.product_id = products.product_id WHERE reviews.review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, rating, comment FROM Customer c JOIN Review r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Review WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, rating, comment FROM Customer c JOIN Review r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id;
SELECT feedback_type, feedback_description FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_type = 'Complaint';
